title: Hora
description: A canonical Hour linked to a calendar entity.

id.description: A short unique identifier to be referenced.

name.description: Name of the Hour (e.g., Lauds, Vespers).

fixedFeastId.description: Optional reference ID to a fixed feast.

movableFeastId.description: Optional reference ID to a movable feast.

seasonalDayId.description: Optional reference ID to a seasonal day.
